NAME: Span
DOC: i;;j represents a span of elements i through j. i;; represents a span from i to the end. ;;j represents a span from the beginning to j. ;; represents a span that includes all elements. i;;j;;k represents a span from i through j in steps of k. i;; ;;k represents a span from i to the end in steps of k. ;;j;;k represents a span from the beginning to j in steps of k. ;; ;;k represents a span from the beginning to the end in steps of k.
